description:
We are a team committed to generating quality services related to information technologies, applying the best practices of the market, and according to the needs of our customers.
At Crux Consultores we have a high degree of commitment to our clients, we are committed to improving their capabilities, maintaining a long-term vision in the solutions and services we provide as in consulting.
